item.description: Take me to the first quote from: ï»¿The Coming Insurrection by comitÃ© invisible, Black Earth: The Holocaust as History and Warning by Timothy Snyder, Hellenistic and Biblical Greek by McLean, B. H., The Histories by Herodotus;Carolyn Dewald;Robin Waterfield July ðŸ”— This swarming little crowd that waits impatiently to be hired while doing whatever it can to seem natural is the result of an attempt to rescue the order of work through an ethos of mobility.
